modified.reason: Show a configuration error overlay when runtime-config keys are missing.

contract_bindings.notes: Edge function login sets Supabase session from returned tokens.
Employees list/create/update/delete use Supabase REST table access.
Weekly schedules and shift CRUD align to schedules/shifts tables.
Employee shift view filters by empId and companyCode.

warnings.message: public/runtime-config.js is not present in the repo; generate it locally or via deploy workflow secrets.
